FIELD.NAME: NDM-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message contains a Tracking Data Message in CCSDS or other format

FIELD.NAME: NDM-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Descriptor of the type / kind of the contents of the TDM. E.g. Doppler, angle, range, one-way.

FIELD.NAME: STREAM-MODE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the mode of the stream of messages as either Real-time, Replay, Simulator, or Test (RT: Real-time, RPY: Replay, SIM: Simulator, TEST: Test/Data Generator)

FIELD.NAME: FINAL-MESSAGE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: When true (and known, especially for replay data), indicates the last message in the stream.

FIELD.NAME: CREATION-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time the Navigation Data Message was created.

FIELD.NAME: ACTIVITY-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the activity occurring within the mission

FIELD.NAME: ORIGINATOR
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Creating agency. E.g. GSFC-FDF, GSOC, JPL, JAXA etc.

FIELD.NAME: START-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Start time of the tracking data

FIELD.NAME: STOP-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Stop time of the tracking data

FIELD.NAME: FREQUENCY-BAND
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Frequency band for transmitted signals (C, S, X, Ka, L, UHF)

FIELD.NAME: DATA-QUALITY
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Raw = no quality check, Validated = checked and passed, Degraded = checked with quality issues.

FIELD.NAME: FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Format of the DATA field (KVN: Keyword = Value Notation, XML: eXtensible Markup Language, RAW: Raw Data, or BIN: Binary Data)
